//notes: PvP: Hammer Forged/Fluted/Polygonal/Corkscrew/Smallbore + Accurized/Steady Rounds + Slideshot/Tunnel Vision/Heating Up/Moving Target + Kill Clip / Wellspring/ Eye of the Storm/EP
This gun can get some really nice rolls. Kill Clip allows it to two tap after the damage nerf, and Tunnel Vision combos really well with it since they both proc off a kill. Depending on how the gun feels for you, the split minor stat boost barrels and steady rounds can help to make up for the terrible base stats tags:god-pvp

// Loud Lullaby (pvp)
//notes: PvP: Hammer Forged/Fluted/Polygonal/Corkscrew/Smallbore + Accurized/Steady Rounds + Slideshot/Tunnel Vision/Heating Up/Moving Target + Kill Clip / Wellspring/ Eye of the Storm/EP
This gun can get some really nice rolls. Kill Clip allows it to two tap after the damage nerf, and Tunnel Vision combos really well with it since they both proc off a kill. Depending on how the gun feels for you, the split minor stat boost barrels and steady rounds can help to make up for the terrible base stats tags:pvp

// Loud Lullaby (pve,pvp)
//notes: PvE: Any (Handling Preferred) + Tac/Appended Mag + Surplus/Slideshot/Subsistence + Frenzy/Kill Clip/Wellspring/EP
PvP: Hammer Forged/Fluted/Polygonal/Corkscrew/Smallbore + Accurized/Steady Rounds + Slideshot/Tunnel Vision/Heating Up/Moving Target + Kill Clip / Wellspring/ Eye of the Storm/EP
This gun can get some really nice rolls. Kill Clip allows it to two tap after the damage nerf, and Tunnel Vision combos really well with it since they both proc off a kill. Depending on how the gun feels for you, the split minor stat boost barrels and steady rounds can help to make up for the terrible base stats tags:pve,pvp
dimwishlist:item=3924212056&perks=4090651448,3161816588,1015611457
dimwishlist:item=3924212056&perks=4090651448,3161816588,3592538738
dimwishlist:item=3924212056&perks=4090651448,3161816588,3038247973
dimwishlist:item=3924212056&perks=1840239774,3161816588,1015611457
dimwishlist:item=3924212056&perks=1840239774,3161816588,3592538738
dimwishlist:item=3924212056&perks=1840239774,3161816588,3038247973


// Loud Lullaby (pvp)
//notes: PvP: Hammer Forged/Fluted/Polygonal/Corkscrew/Smallbore + Accurized/Steady Rounds + Slideshot/Tunnel Vision/Heating Up/Moving Target + Kill Clip / Wellspring/ Eye of the Storm/EP
This gun can get some really nice rolls. Kill Clip allows it to two tap after the damage nerf, and Tunnel Vision combos really well with it since they both proc off a kill. Depending on how the gun feels for you, the split minor stat boost barrels and steady rounds can help to make up for the terrible base stats tags:pvp

dimwishlist:item=3924212056&perks=3177308360,2946784966,1015611457
dimwishlist:item=3924212056&perks=3177308360,2946784966,3038247973

//notes: PvP: Hammer Forged/Fluted/Polygonal/Corkscrew/Smallbore + Accurized/Steady Rounds + Slideshot/Tunnel Vision/Heating Up/Moving Target + Kill Clip / Wellspring/ Eye of the Storm/EP

// Loud Lullaby (pvp)
//notes: PvP: Hammer Forged/Fluted/Polygonal/Corkscrew/Smallbore + Accurized/Steady Rounds + Slideshot/Tunnel Vision/Heating Up/Moving Target + Kill Clip / Wellspring/ Eye of the Storm/EP
This gun can get some really nice rolls. Kill Clip allows it to two tap after the damage nerf, and Tunnel Vision combos really well with it since they both proc off a kill. Depending on how the gun feels for you, the split minor stat boost barrels and steady rounds can help to make up for the terrible base stats tags:pvp

// Loud Lullaby (pvp)
//notes: PvP: Hammer Forged/Fluted/Polygonal/Corkscrew/Smallbore + Accurized/Steady Rounds + Slideshot/Tunnel Vision/Heating Up/Moving Target + Kill Clip / Wellspring/ Eye of the Storm/EP
This gun can get some really nice rolls. Kill Clip allows it to two tap after the damage nerf, and Tunnel Vision combos really well with it since they both proc off a kill. Depending on how the gun feels for you, the split minor stat boost barrels and steady rounds can help to make up for the terrible base stats tags:pvp

// Loud Lullaby (pve,pvp)
//notes: PvE: Any (Handling Preferred) + Tac/Appended Mag + Surplus/Slideshot/Subsistence + Frenzy/Kill Clip/Wellspring/EP
PvP: Hammer Forged/Fluted/Polygonal/Corkscrew/Smallbore + Accurized/Steady Rounds + Slideshot/Tunnel Vision/Heating Up/Moving Target + Kill Clip / Wellspring/ Eye of the Storm/EP
This gun can get some really nice rolls. Kill Clip allows it to two tap after the damage nerf, and Tunnel Vision combos really well with it since they both proc off a kill. Depending on how the gun feels for you, the split minor stat boost barrels and steady rounds can help to make up for the terrible base stats tags:pve,pvp
dimwishlist:item=3924212056&perks=3161816588,1015611457
dimwishlist:item=3924212056&perks=3161816588,3592538738
dimwishlist:item=3924212056&perks=3161816588,3038247973

This gun can get some really nice rolls. Kill Clip allows it to two tap after the damage nerf, and Tunnel Vision combos really well with it since they both proc off a kill. Depending on how the gun feels for you, the split minor stat boost barrels and steady rounds can help to make up for the terrible base stats tags:pvp
